title: Built with Open Source. Fueled by Frustration. Finished at :33 — and Watched by a Dog.
description: What started as a late-night frustration with softswitches turned into a simple, self-building call center platform — powered by open source and a strange obsession with the number 33.

title: How to quickly deploy a static website
description: Static websites are now used to bootstrap lots of websites and are becoming the basis for a variety of tools that influence both web designers and developers.
